title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Air and Climate
body: Materials For Loan - Air and Climate       Where's the Air? An educational kit about the science of air quality, and the social behavior that affects the air. Kit includes poster, teacher's activity guide, and a CD-ROM, which has games for children near the age of 10 years old. All other resources are suitable for all ages.     Clean Air, Healthy Children: A teacher's guide and activities for young children. Educational materials t are desihatgned to introduce children to the concepts of respiratory health, air quality, and caring for the environment. Thorough background information is included for the educator.   To reserve and check-out the above educational items, call the education office at (219) 395-1885.   All items must be picked up and returned to the Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education.
